title: Newsom signs law to protect kids from the risks of AI chatbots
description: California Gov. Gavin Newsom on Monday signed legislation to regulate artificial intelligence chatbots and protect children and teens from the potential dangers of the technology.
content:
By TRÂN NGUYỄN
SACRAMENTO, Calif. (AP) — California Gov. Gavin Newsom on Monday vetoed landmark legislation that would have restricted children’s access to AI chatbots.

title: Philippines launches National AI Strategy
